dhruvarb/birthday.summary: Recent activities in the dhruvarb/birthday repository include two push events on October 22, 2024, where files were uploaded and an index.html file was created, indicating initial setup and content addition to the repository.

such3/sdmConnect.summary: The such3/sdmConnect repository saw a significant improvement on December 17, 2024, with a pull request that enhanced mobile responsiveness, added images, and updated the HTML structure using Tailwind CSS for better typography and layout, ensuring visual consistency across the dashboard.

profile_summary: As a detail-oriented developer with a strong foundation in HTML, I build and maintain a range of projects across my six public repositories, continually refining my skills and exploring new ways to apply my expertise. With a focus on writing clean, efficient code, I strive to deliver high-quality solutions that meet the needs of users. Through my ongoing development work, I aim to establish a strong presence in the coding community and collaborate with like-minded professionals to drive innovation and growth.
